name: Camp Pacht
description:
Welcome to Camp Pacht!

Come relax in this atmosopheric low-poly campsite. Shrink yourself down to explore the homes of strangely intelligent animals. Play with scale to solve mind-bending puzzles.

Controls:

Move - WASD
Look - Mouse
Interact - Left Click
Exit puzzle focus mode - Esc/Q/Tab
Toggle Magnifying Glass - Q

Created by Christian Bonnell, Guy Marino, Jeremy Novak, and Devin Ohlson

(It's like compact, get it?)
